description: A sleeveless felted wool gilet in gray-green with visible patches

core:description.text: A sleeveless gilet of felted wool dyed a dull gray-green, the color of river moss. The felting has made the fabric dense and wind-resistant, though years of wear have necessitated patches at the shoulder seams and along the hem. Bone buttons secure the front, and the cut is practical rather than fashionableâ€”a working garment for a working creature.
